item.description:
Meet at Jeff Marsh's place at 5:30/5:45 and then head to Copley Square at 6 to pass out tea party fliers and talk to people about Ron Paul.

Then afterwards people are welcome back to his place for drinks and to watch "NOW: The Ron Paul Phenomenon" on PBS at 8pm. His address is 130 Newbury St and his phone number 203-767-3514. Feel free to call whenever. Once again if you can't make it to his place by 6 just head to the Copley T stop on the Green Line and we will basically be standing within 100 feet of the entrance/exit. The more the merrier even if you can only make it for a little bit.

Bring signs, Tea Party flyers and regular Ron Paul literature to hand out to those who want more information about him.

If anyone is in need of literature and/or signs (and lawn holders), Corie has a surplus and would love to get a lot of it distributed. Call her at 508-308-9008 to come pick it up. She lives in the North End.
item.name: Copley T-Stop Flyer Distribution / Sign Wave
